# Claude Code Learning Hub
# https://codewithclaude.net

> A free, open-source learning platform for mastering AI-powered development with Claude Code.

## About This Site

Claude Code Learning Hub teaches developers and researchers how to:
- Install and configure Claude Code effectively
- Work in VS Code on real projects
- Use Python and R for data analysis
- Master Git & GitHub workflows
- Build and ship apps & automations
- Create AI agents with MCP servers

## Target Audience

- Beginners with no coding experience
- Academic researchers learning to code
- Data analysts transitioning to Python/R
- Developers wanting to leverage AI assistance
- Anyone curious about AI-powered development

## Learning Tracks

### Start Here (Beginners)
/start-here - Complete setup guide for Mac and Windows
/start-here/what-is-claude-code - Introduction to Claude Code
/start-here/installation-setup - Step-by-step installation
/start-here/vs-code-setup - VS Code configuration
/start-here/claude-code-for-researchers - Guide for academic researchers

### Data Analysis
/data-analysis - Python and R for data analysis
/data-analysis/python-basics - Python fundamentals
/data-analysis/pandas-intro - Data manipulation with pandas
/data-analysis/data-visualization - Creating charts and graphs
/data-analysis/r-basics - R programming basics

### App Builder
/app-builder - Build web applications
/app-builder/react-basics - React fundamentals
/app-builder/nextjs-intro - Next.js framework
/app-builder/full-stack-app - Full-stack development

### Automation
/automation - Automate repetitive tasks
/automation/shell-scripting - Shell scripting basics
/automation/python-automation - Python automation scripts
/automation/workflow-optimization - Optimize your workflow

### Git & GitHub
/git-github - Version control mastery
/git-github/git-basics - Git fundamentals
/git-github/github-workflow - GitHub collaboration
/git-github/branching-merging - Advanced Git techniques

### AI Agents
/agents - Build AI agents
/agents/mcp-servers - MCP server development
/agents/autonomous-agents - Creating autonomous systems

### Advanced Topics
/advanced-topics - Expert-level techniques
/advanced-topics/best-practices - Claude Code best practices
/advanced-topics/custom-configurations - Advanced configuration

## Tools & Resources

/tools/templates - Project starter templates
/tools/snippets - Reusable code snippets
/tools/cheatsheets - Quick reference guides
/tools/mcp-explorer - MCP server directory
/tools/claude-md-generator - CLAUDE.md file generator
/tools/slash-commands - Custom slash commands

/resources - External resources and links

## Blog & Updates

/blog - Latest tutorials, announcements, and tips

## Key Features

- Hands-on tutorials with real code examples
- Platform-specific guides (Mac & Windows)
- Interactive code blocks with copy functionality
- Progress tracking for learning modules
- Dark/light mode support
- Mobile-responsive design

## Technology Stack

- Next.js 14 (React)
- TypeScript
- Tailwind CSS
- MDX for content
- Deployed on Render

## Contact

Website: https://codewithclaude.net
GitHub: https://github.com/anthropics/claude-code
